titleInfo.title: Harry Hoffman in Front of His Father's Store

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item photograph, 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#970 Harry Hoffman in front of father's store 1929." Handwritten on back of photo: "Harry Hoffman at 19 working at father's clothing store at 18th & Larimer, 1929., Harry Hoffman, 1929., #970."

mods.abstract: Harry Hoffman stands in front of his father's clothing store surrounded by jackets and boots. More shoes and clothing can be seen in window displays on either side of the door.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
